name: Fire Slash
basicDescription: Wrap fire around the sword and set enemies on fire

basicDescription: Charges as fast as lightning and attacks the enemy

specificDescription: Attacks with X% earth DMG that penetrates enemies within a 5 range with 50% stun

name: Blizzard

name: Rave

name: Mantra
basicDescription: Absorbs the energy condensed in the orb and greatly amplifies basic abilities
specificDescription: Total ATK, HP +X%. The effect is applied without equipped in the slot
